summary: MOISTURE IS VISIBLE IN BOTH FRONT HEAD LAMPS AFTER RAIN OR DEW FROM OVERNIGHT.  BERGEY'S CHEVROLET (COLMAR, PA) SAW PICTURES AND ADVISED THERE IS A SERVICE BULLETIN FROM CHEVROLET THAT THEY ARE AWARE OF THE ISSUE AND TO ONLY REPLACE THEM IF THEY ARE FILLED WITH WATER.  OTHERWISE THE LIGHTS SHOULD CLEAR WITHIN 2-6 HOURS. NOT COMET LT SATISFIED WITH H THE ANSWER BUT WILL MONITOR.
